definitions.definition: A strong, unpleasant emotion or feeling caused by actual or perceived danger or threat.
examples: He was struck by fear on seeing the snake.

definitions.definition: A phobia , a sense of fear induced by something or someone.
examples: Not everybody has the same fears . I have a fear of ants .

definitions.definition: Terrified veneration or reverence , particularly towards God , gods , or sovereigns .
A feeling of dread and anxiety when waking after drinking a lot of alcohol , wondering what one did while drunk.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A strong, unpleasant emotion or feeling caused by actual or perceived danger or threat.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A phobia , a sense of fear induced by something or someone.
( uncountable ) Terrified veneration or reverence , particularly towards God , gods , or sovereigns .
( UK , with definite article, "the fear" ) A feeling of dread and anxiety when waking after drinking a lot of alcohol , wondering what one did while drunk.
